item.description:
Want to sit outside in a beautiful setting and have a wine tasting?

It is time for us to try a vineyard visit!  This vineyard will be open on this evening for a wine tasting from 5-6.(cost $6) Then at 7:00 until 9:00 there will be live music by local guitar wizards Judy Handler and Mark Levesque.  They are great (see below). We can bring our own picnic/potluck dinners and relax on the deck.  The concert costs $5 and can be enjoyed either inside or you can still hear them outside on the deck.

Husband and wife duo, Judy Handler and Mark Levesque blend Brazilian, Latin American, swing, gypsy, classical and folk music influences to create their sophisticated and expressive arrangements.  Audiences respond with great enthusiasm to their extraordinary sound and the uplifting spirit of their music. 
They have performed over 1,200 concerts together throughout the Northeast and Midwest. 

Website for the vineyard:

http://www.lostacresvineyard.com/

This is a new place, just opened last year.  Let's give it a try!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Vineyard visit
